docs.text: Ejercicio 01 - TODO Enlace a E02 Python city = ['Tokyo','New York','Toronto','Hong Kong'] print('Cities loop:') for x in city: print('City: ' + x) print('\n') # newline num = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9] print('x^2 loop:') for x in num: y = x * x print(str(x) + '*' + str(x) + '=' + str(y)) HTML <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Document</title> </head> <body> </body> </html> CSS h1 { color: red; padding: 1em; }

docs.text: city = ['Tokyo','New York','Toronto','Hong Kong'] print('Cities loop:') for x in city: print('City: ' + x) print('\n') # newline num = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9] print('x^2 loop:') for x in num: y = x * x print(str(x) + '*' + str(x) + '=' + str(y))
